body.name: Armen Living Summer Chair in Charcoal Fabric and Walnut Wood Finish, 31" x 25" x 22"
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.

features: Versatile Mid-Century Modern Design: The Armen Living Summer chair seamlessly blends mid-century modern and contemporary aesthetics, making it an adaptable addition to any room's décor. Its versatile design ensures it can serve as an inviting centerpiece in your kitchen, dining area, home office, or even commercial settings.

Exceptional Comfort and Support: The bucket seat design of the Summer chair is not only stylish but also ergonomically designed to provide exceptional support and comfort. The medium-high cushioned open back ensures your back stays supported and aligned, making it perfect for long hours of relaxation or work.

Stylish Upholstery Choices: The Summer chair features bold fabric upholstered seats available in your choice of charcoal, green, or blue. This allows you to personalize your space and add a pop of color or blend it seamlessly with your existing décor.

Easy Setup and Warranty: With easy and quick assembly, you can start enjoying the Summer chair in no time. Armen Living stands by the quality and craftsmanship of their product, offering a 1-year warranty for added peace of mind. This chair is designed to last and maintain its aesthetic appeal for years to come.
body.description: The Armen Living Summer mid-century chair is a beautiful piece for the contemporary household. This stylized bucket seat chair features a sturdy walnut wood finished frame. The Summer's fabric upholstered back and seat offer an exceptional degree of comfort and support while brilliantly accenting the chair's novel frame. Ideal for the living room, but versatile enough to fit in just about every room of the house, the Summer is a must have. Echoing early modern design decors, the Summer chair provides a simple yet comfortable place to sit for long stretches. It features a bold fabric upholstered seat with a walnut wood finish. The back provides extra support, while the foam filling and fabric covering provides added lushness to keep you comfortable. This piece is both unique and eye catching that you can play up or down in any room in your home. It is the perfect size for small spaces such as dorm rooms or apartment or it can be use to entertain large gathering in style. The medium high cushion open back is ideal for posture alignment and an unmatched support for days on end. The foundation of the product is supported by solid walnut wood for a sturdy and stylish aesthetic without comprising practicality and functionality of this item. This item is a versatile piece that can be ideal for dining, kitchen or even home office desk chairs. This product ships in one box with easy and quick set up. We stand by the quality, the craftsmanship and the integrity of our product by offer 1-year warranty for all our products. The ergonomically shaped seat and aesthetically pleasing design truly adds to what makes this a fantastic design. The Summer chair is available in your choice of charcoal, green, or blue fabric. Product Dimensions: 25"W x 22"D x 31"H SH: 19"

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dining chairs to fit any style Contemporary Furniture pieces should make a bold statement but at the same time be simple and uncluttered, without curves or decoration. Smooth, clean, geometric shapes are essential. Upholstered furniture often wears black, white, or other neutral tones, using the natural fibers found in wool, cotton, linen, silk, jute to add textural appeal. Rustic/Industrial Industrial design is great for people who do not want a cluttered home. Industrial décor lends itself to a sleek, organized arrangement. It provides a reclaimed feel to your home with a sophisticated comfort. If you are looking to shake up your industrial style, add blooming plants or soft textured rugs to your space. Mid Century Modern Most Mid-Century modern homes showcase three predominant characteristics: a clean, minimalist aesthetic, an emphasis on bringing the outdoors in, and the presence of angular structures. The minimalist aesthetic is a connection to Scandinavian minimalism and the incorporation of natural materials is a core feature that fuels its following. Glam Glam design is where luxury meets sophistication in a glitzy decor scheme that seduces the senses. It feels very luxurious and elevated with mirrored furniture, rich fabrics, and metallic accents combined to create a look that plays on the extravagant. Imagine chandeliers with cascades of crystals glittering against tufted furniture draped with faux furs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality chair
reviews.reviewText: Very well made, easy to assemble, comfortable and high quality. Using this as an office chair in my home office and I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable All Day!
reviews.reviewText: Have been looking for a desk chair that doesn't kill my back for years. Also am kinda short. . . so my feet never touch the floor. No matter how "ergonomic" (expensive) they all tend to be crap. Thought I'd try this one . . . and wow! It's excellent. I work at a desk for 8-10 hours a day. This is super comfortable. Great lower back support. My feet touch the floor. And, it looks great in my home office. Nice enough to use as an extra chair at the dinner table if need be. It's just a simple, well designed, reasonably priced chair with no BS. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and chic
reviews.reviewText: I really love these dining chairs. They were a breeze to assemble (just attach the legs which are in 2 parts) and I really like the spacious seat and armrests.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great looking chairs
reviews.reviewText: These chairs are just what I wanted! I was little disappointed that one of them arrived without hardware, so I had to improvise and use the extra bolts from other chairs and just run to hardware store to get 5 washers I needed. Also, 3 out of 8 chairs had and issue with threading for one of the screws and I was unable to fully screw one of them in. So, chair is little wobbly and if feels like one leg is longer than others. I unfortunately threw away all of the papers that came with the chairs, so I was unable to reach out to the manufacturer directly. But still a great buy for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Very Well-Constructed
reviews.reviewText: I'll echo the other very positive comments about this eye-catching chair. First, it has Nordic-style good looks. The beautifully curved seat and legs and floating, hemispherical back are just about as perfect as it gets aesthetically. (The style is evocative of an Eames chair.) Second, this chair is made entirely of natural wood and the finishing is remarkably refined for this price point. The walnut stain is just about perfect (both color-wise and in its uniformity). The charcoal fabric is simple and understated. The feet have silicon sliders that will not scratch wood floors. Third, this is an exceptionally easy chair to put together. Just one bolt to join the x-shaped legs together and four more to attach them to the seat. We had both of our chairs assembled in 12 minutes. The chairs are very efficiently packed in easy-to-carry boxes (and are surprisingly light). There was absolutely no transit damage at all - not even a minor scratch. Finally, and most importantly, the chairs are strong and rigid and very comfortable to sit in. I'm actually astonished that such good quality, beautifully-designed chairs are available at this price point. If you're considering this chair, go ahead and purchase with confidence. I can certainly attest to the high rating here on Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not for overweight people
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this chair. It’s absolutely beautiful and I get a ton of compliments on it. It’s very easy to put together, a great size, the arm rests are perfect. Only negative is that an overweight person will make the legs slide out a little. Enough for the person to feel like it can’t hold them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Leg Completely Snapped - SMALL PERSON USE ONLY!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this chair 5/22. Less than a year later one of the legs has completely snapped in two. The person using the chair weighs 185 lbs so it's certainly not a weight issue! I've reached out to the company and am waiting for a favorable response. Once I get a response, I will update this review.I rated the chair 3 stars on assembly because if you purchase the rotating element that is suggested at purchase, be prepared to struggle with the installation. I had one of my carpenters assemble it and even with his professional skillset it was still a struggle to assemble. Things didn't line up, etc.Finally, I'm giving it a ONE STAR on comfort. While it is a cute chair, it is NOT AT ALL comfortable!!!! It's made for a small person with a small behind!!! Anything bigger than a woman's size 12 will find this chair uncomfortable! My son is 6'2" and weighs 185 lbs. He can fit in this chair, but mom and dad can't. Definitely made for a small framed person! Had I known that I wouldn't have made the purchase.

Friends comment about the chairs looks. It is solidly built and simple to put together and even includes the hex key. I thought that with the ascetics the chair would not be that comfortable. I was wrong very comfortable.I would not hesitate to purchase a product from this company again.

reviews.reviewTitle: デザイン、使い心地ともにGOOD
reviews.reviewText: デザイン性が高いのに値段もこなれていて、とてもお買い得だと思いました。アメリカ人？の小さいというレビューがたくさんありますが、椅子としては大きいです。ただソファーのようにリラックスして座れます。1人がけソファーと思えばとても小さいです。椅子とソファーのいいとこどりの良い買い物でした。

This chair was way better than I ever could’ve expected. It was very easy to put together, and it is a solid chair. Very modern, it looks great and like a quality piece of furniture. The comfort level is fantastic. I’ve never had a chair so comfortably hug me, its awesome

reviews.reviewTitle: Great lower back support, super comfortable!
reviews.reviewText: Amazing chair! I was worried about support for my lower back and this chair totally supports me. Really comfortable! Don’t be fooled by cheaper “look-a-likes” on here. The wooden seat part is one continuous piece, same with the legs (each set of two). The look-a-likes are all sections which spoils the affect.I also added the Fasmo barstool swivel, as per another reviewer the holes line up perfectly. We did have to purchase four screws to get the correct length. I suggest doing the same if using as a desk chair.Well worth the price in quality alone.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice design, easy to assemble, quick delivery, but...
reviews.reviewText: I am satisfied with this purchase except for 2 issues I consider not important enough to send them back.1. The upholstery fabric on the back (the arched part) should have been stretched tighter. In 4/6 chairs I bought, I can see crinkling ; there's nothing to do.2. Legs are a bit uneven which make the chairs unstable (slightly rock). But once you sit on, it's stable. No rocking.Crinkles bother me more than slight instability. Yet not enough to send them back. 3.5/5 is my rating.
